attributes.action: Easier home purchasing for young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Myself and my partner are reading to move out on our own and start our lives together, but we are halted on the first step by ott house prices and rent costs.

We have a joint income of £2000 per month if we wanted a house the payments would use almost all of that fund instantly.

Either the wages in the UK need to go up or the government need to step in do something about the UK house prices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
